themes: redistribution of funding away from many groups
perceived favoritism toward select cultural groups
loss of support for minority and female-led organizations
community-wide negative impact of funding decisions
survival and thriving of smaller arts organizations
key_phrases: frustrated that more recently ACME has taken funding from a large number of groups
focused on giving larger amounts to specific cultural groups while overlooking others
removing funding from Trouble Puppet and Glass Half Full, which is female minority owned and run
shows are highly awarded and focused in cultural and environmental themes
majority of the arts community come back empty handed last year
the community reeled and attempted to figure out what to do
sharing the wealth so that more groups can survive and attempt to thrive makes more sense
barriers_identified: removal of funding from minority and female-led organizations
overlooking of certain groups in funding decisions
majority of arts community left without support
solutions_proposed: sharing the wealth so that more groups can survive and attempt to thrive
